readme: Pool with no duplicates by artist - title

query._GROUP_0: (STYLE IS Stoner Rock OR STYLE IS Doom Metal OR STYLE IS Garage Rock Revival OR STYLE IS Black Metal OR STYLE IS Post-Rock OR STYLE IS Stoner Sludge) AND STYLE IS Female Vocal AND NOT STYLE IS Live AND %RATING% IS 5
query._GROUP_1: (STYLE IS Stoner Rock OR STYLE IS Doom Metal OR STYLE IS Black Metal OR STYLE IS Post-Rock OR STYLE IS Stoner Sludge) AND STYLE IS Female Vocal AND NOT STYLE IS Live AND %RATING% IS 3
query._GROUP_2: (STYLE IS Stoner Rock OR STYLE IS Doom Metal OR STYLE IS Black Metal OR STYLE IS Post-Rock OR STYLE IS Stoner Sludge) AND STYLE IS Female Vocal AND NOT STYLE IS Live AND %RATING% GREATER 3
